definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

pinyin: si4 yi3 ji1 qian1 zhong1 du2

sentences.english: Leboratory prepared cyclic ethylene urea was used in these experiments.
sentences.chinese: 在各项研究中均系采用实验室制备的环亚乙基尿素。

sentences.english: Oxygen enriching membranes are first prepared from room temperature thermotropic cholesteric liquid crystal and ethyl cellulose.
sentences.chinese: 首创了室温热致胆甾液晶与乙基纤维素共混富氧膜。

sentences.english: Propolis-Ethylcellulose Microsphere (PEMS) was prepared with physical chemistry method.
sentences.chinese: 采用液中干燥法制备了蜂胶乙基纤维素微球。

sentences.english: The cells that I showed you dying in cell culture are dying from methylmercury.
sentences.chinese: 我给你看死于乙基汞的细胞培养中的细胞。

sentences.english: Ethylcellulose( EC ) was used as wall materials to prepare EC- propolis microcapsules, by the physical chemistry method.
sentences.chinese: 以乙基纤维素为囊材，采用物理化学法制备蜂胶微囊。

sentences.english: The anionic complex of VO2(PAR)-reacts with ethyl violet in the presence of PVA to form an ion-association complex.
sentences.chinese: 钒与PAR的络阴离子和乙基紫反应形成离子缔合物。

sentences.english: Ethyl Monoethanolamine is a colourless liquid, miscible with water, alcohol and ether.
sentences.chinese: 乙基乙醇胺是一种无色液体，与水，醇，醚混溶。

sentences.english: These peaks correspond to side-chain cleavage of the ethyl and propyl groups respectively.
sentences.chinese: 这些峰分别相当于乙基和丙基的侧链开裂。

sentences.english: The method is compatible with concentration detection of diethyl ketone in the air at a workplace.
sentences.chinese: 本方法适用于工作场所空气中二乙基甲酮的浓度测定。

sentences.english: A gas chromatographic method for the determination of 3-octanone in occupational atmospheres was developed.
sentences.chinese: 报道了空气中乙基戊基甲酮的气相色谱测定方法。

sentences.english: Automobile exhaust tetraethyl lead is a highly toxic substance.
sentences.chinese: 汽车尾气中的四乙基铅是剧毒物质。

sentences.english: Manufacture of Phenyl and Phenylethyl Malonic Esters.
sentences.chinese: 苯基和苯基乙基丙二酸酯的生产。

definition: cyclopentene C5H8 (ring of five carbon atoms)
